S

self - Variable in class Client
 
sendHit() - Method in class Client
send a hit command to the server, called from the action listener of hitButton and stayButton.
sendMessage(String, String) - Method in class Dealer.Player
Send message uses the Formatter object created in #Player(Socket, String) to send messages to connected Client.
sendMessage(String, String[]) - Method in class Dealer.Player
An alternative to Dealer.Player.sendMessage(String, String) that handles the same, except can deliver an array of messages instead of one string.
sendStay() - Method in class Client
send a stay command to the server, called from the action listener of hitButton and stayButton.
server - Variable in class Dealer
 
setButtonsActive(boolean) - Method in class Client
Set the hit and stay buttons disabled or enabled based on status property
setStatus(String) - Method in class Client
Display any status to be shown to the user inbetween decks of cards
setSuspended(boolean) - Method in class Dealer.Player
a lock safety as advised to use, so that the Player object knows if the dealer has suspended it upon being signaled.
shufflePile() - Method in class Pile
Uses the Collections library to shuffle all cards currently held in the pile
startClient() - Method in class Client
open up the needed Socket connections and execute the thread itself.
StartClient - Class in <Unnamed>
StartClient launches a new Client, and is a Runnable so that it can be called alongside others in NewGame.
StartClient() - Constructor for class StartClient
 
StartDealer - Class in <Unnamed>
StartDealer launches a new Dealer, and is a Runnable so that it can be called alongside others in NewGame.
StartDealer() - Constructor for class StartDealer
 
status - Variable in class Client
 
stayButton - Variable in class Client
 
suit - Variable in class Card
 
suits - Variable in class Pile
 
suspended - Variable in class Dealer.Player
